comments: Primes p such that A140686(p) = 0. - _Michael Somos_, Feb 12 2011Primes (along with 2) which cannot be written in the form a^2 + 7*b^2, where a > 0, b > 0. - _V. Raman_, Sep 08 2012
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (MAGMA) [ p: p in PrimesUpTo(600) | p mod 7 in {0, 3, 5, 6} ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 12 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
